Title: Quest for Camelot
Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Family, Fantasy, Musical
Writer: Vera Chapman (novel), Kirk DeMicco (screenplay), William Schifrin (screenplay), Jacqueline Feather (screenplay), David Seidler (screenplay)
Actors: Jessalyn Gilsig, Andrea Corr, Cary Elwes, Bryan White
Plot: An adventurous girl, a young blind hermit, and a goofy two-headed dragon race to find the lost sword Excalibur to save King Arthur and Camelot from disaster.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 5 nominations.
